100915,"The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe (Chronicles of Narnia, #1)",,,,,,US,https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1353029077l/100915._SX98_.jpg,https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1353029077l/100915._SY75_.jpg,2005,,,HarperCollins Publishers,eng,false,"Narnia… the land beyond the wardrobe door, a secret place frozen in eternal winter, a magical country waiting to be set free.

Lucy is the first to find the secret of the wardrobe in the professor's mysterious old house. At first her brothers and sister don't believe her when she tells of her visit to the land of Narnia. But soon Edmund, then Peter and Susan step through the wardrobe themselves. In Narnia they find a country buried under the evil enchantment of the White Witch. When they meet the Lion Aslan, they realize they've been called to a great adventure and bravely join the battle to free Narnia from the Witch's sinister spell.","{""id"":{""_"":""4790821"",""type"":""integer""},""books_count"":{""_"":""965"",""type"":""integer""},""best_book_id"":{""_"":""100915"",""type"":""integer""},""reviews_count"":{""_"":""2830983"",""type"":""integer""},""ratings_sum"":{""_"":""9141839"",""type"":""integer""},""ratings_count"":{""_"":""2167421"",""type"":""integer""},""text_reviews_count"":{""_"":""22397"",""type"":""integer""},""original_publication_year"":{""_"":""1950"",""type"":""integer""},""original_publication_month"":{""_"":""10"",""type"":""integer""},""original_publication_day"":{""_"":""16"",""type"":""integer""},""original_title"":""The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe"",""original_language_id"":{""type"":""integer"",""nil"":""true""},""media_type"":""book"",""rating_dist"":""5:1043542|4:683551|3:338190|2:73217|1:28921|total:2167421"",""desc_user_id"":{""_"":""94965692"",""type"":""integer""},""default_chaptering_book_id"":{""type"":""integer"",""nil"":""true""},""default_description_language_code"":{""nil"":""true""},""work_uri"":""kca://work/amzn1.gr.work.v1.rqpJlzO5rS559vW35rJa1w""}",4.22,206,Paperback,Film tie-in (US/Can.),2086803,16380,https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/100915.The_Lion_the_Witch_and_the_Wardrobe,https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/100915.The_Lion_the_Witch_and_the_Wardrobe,"{""author"":{""id"":""1069006"",""name"":""C.S. (See also the alternative Chronological Reading Order.) Also known as: Deutsch: Die Chroniken von Narnia Ukrainian: Хроніки Нарнії Slovenija: Zgodbe iz Narnije Russian: Хроники Нарнии Français: Le Monde de Narnia Spanish: Las crónicas de Narnia Brazilian Portuguese: As crônicas de Nárnia Portuguese: As crónicas de Nárnia Czech: Letopisy Narnie Dutch: De kronieken van Narnia Italian: Le cronache di Narnia Polish: Opowieści z Narnii Swedish: Berättelsen om Narnia Finnish: Narnian tarinat Romanian: Cronicile din Narnia Serbian: Летописи Нарније/Letopisi Narnije Turkish: Narnia Günlükleri Persian: ماجراهای نارنیا Hebrew: סיפורי ממלכת נרניה "",""note"":"" Removed omnibus editions which are in Chronological order. An omnibus ediion which contains only The Magician's Nephew and The Lion, the Witch, and the Wardrobe is most likely to be in Chronological Order and should NOT be included in this series.
